# Glossary of Supervertaler Terminology

## Supervertaler tab structure
- Project editor: grid
- Resources: 
  - TMs
  - Glossaries
  - Supermemory
  - Non-translatables
  - Segmentation rules
  - Image Context
  - Prompt Manager 
- Tools:
  - AutoFingers (Automated translation pasting for memoQ from TMX files)
  - PDF Rescue (AI OCR)
  - Superbench (LLM Translation Quality Benchmarking System)
  - Superbrowser (Multi-Chat AI Browser)
  - Supercleaner (DOCX tag cleaner, like CodeZapper)
  - Superlookup: unified concordance search
  - Supervoice: dictation stuff
  - Text Encoding Repair
  - TMX Editor
  - Tracked Changes  
- Settings:
  - General
  - AI Settings
  - Language Pair
  - MT Settings
  - View Settings
  - System prompts
  - Debug
  - Features
  - Domain detection
  - Keyboard shortcuts
  - Log

## UI Elements

- Compare box: with fields "current source", "TM source" and "TM target"
- Preview: the document preview
- Project editor, Project grid, Grid
- Termview: shows glosary matches in same layout as source text
- Translation results panel, Results panel (change to: Match panel?)
- focus border: the blue line around the selected target box
- TM Info
- Term Info

## Other CAT tools

### memoQ
- Project home
- Resource console

### Trados
- Project settings
- General settings
